text: RheinEnergieStadion, formerly Müngersdorfer Stadion, is a football stadium in Cologne, Germany and is the home stadium of Bundesliga club 1. FC Köln. The stadium was opened on 16 September 1923. It was renovated from 1972 to 1975 and from 2002 to 2004. Local energy company RheinEnergie AG holds naming rights for the stadium. The stadium has a seating capacity of about 50,000 seats for domestic matches and about 45,000 seats for international matches. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Football stadiums in Germany Category:Buildings and structures in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Sport in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Cologne Category:1923 establishments in Germany
title: RheinEnergieStadion
